name: Subdural Hematoma
description: This module describes the Common Data elements and Macros for Subdural Hematoma

attributes.name: Width - Axial Max
attributes.description: Longest diameter measured in the axial plane

attributes.name: Volume - Tada Formula
attributes.description: V?=?a???b???c???1/2, where ?V? represents hematoma volume; ?a? indicates the diameter of the largest area of the hematoma layer; ?b? shows the upright diameter of the diameter of the largest area of the hematoma layer, and ?c? is the layer thickness
